summary: A working class teenager comes of age in 1910s rural Sweden, moving from job to job and meeting a variety of individuals who gradually shape his future.
cast: Eddie Axberg|Gudrun Brost|Ulla Akselson|Bo Wahlström|Rick Axberg|Holger Löwenadler|Göran Lindberg|Tage Sjögren|Tage Jonsson|Allan Edwall|Anna Maria Blind|Birger Lensander|Max von Sydow|Ulf Palme|Jan-Erik Lindqvist|Börje Nyberg|Gunnar Björnstrand|Signe Stade|Stig Törnblom|Åke Fridell|Ulla Sjöblom|Friedrich Ochsner|Catti Edfeldt|Ulla Blomstrand|Bengt Ekerot|Per Oscarsson|Bertil Linné
title: El fuego de la vida
